titleStmt.title: J. W. Wildey to Grant Green
CWG7985

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
Arctic Insurance Company
18 WALL STREET
New York, June 8 1863.
Hon Grant Green, Auditor,
Frankfort, Ky.
Dr Sir:

Yr 3d Recd. As we are appointing Agents in yr State, & will be doing so for some time to come & having a large acquaintance requiring the use of a Commissioner for yr State, I take the liberty of applyin to you, if possibly, you can put me on the track to secure that appointment, you being the only State Officer, with whom I have had any correspondence. I am cashier of this office & refer to its offices' & Director, -- a list of whom I enclose -- It would be an accommodation for the office, even if no other result should come from it.

New York
Comr of Deeds
J. W. Wildey
City
Appd June 12 1863
